channel.title: CVE Feed for Mozilla -- Focus for iOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mozilla -- Focus for iOS

item.title: CVE-2024-8399|2024-09-03T20:50:34.126Z -- mozilla -- focus%20for%20ios
item.description: Websites could utilize Javascript links to spoof URL addresses in the Focus navigation bar This vulnerability affects Focus for iOS < 130.

item.title: CVE-2024-5022|2024-08-01T20:55:10.438Z -- mozilla -- focus%20for%20ios
item.description: The file scheme of URLs would be hidden, resulting in potential spoofing of a website's address in the location bar This vulnerability affects Focus for iOS < 126.

item.title: CVE-2024-5022|2024-05-17T18:42:24.791Z -- mozilla -- focus%20for%20ios
item.description: The file scheme of URLs would be hidden, resulting in potential spoofing of a website's address in the location bar This vulnerability affects Focus for iOS < 126.

item.title: CVE-2024-5022|2024-07-16T12:58:14.617Z -- mozilla -- focus%20for%20ios
item.description: The file scheme of URLs would be hidden, resulting in potential spoofing of a website's address in the location bar This vulnerability affects Focus for iOS < 126.
